  • Method Details

    • remove

      public static <T> void remove(Collection<T> coll, Predicate<T> pred)
      Removes the element from the collection for which the predicate returns true. It uses iterators to iterate over the collection to avoid ConcurrentModificationException.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Template of type Integer but could be of any other type.
      Parameters:
      coll - A collection of type T elements.
      pred - A Predicate instance that returns a boolean based on satisfied condition.

    • retain

      public static <T> void retain(Collection<T> coll, Predicate<T> pred)
      Removes the element from the collection for which the predicate returns false. It uses iterators to iterate over the collection to avoid ConcurrentModificationException.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Template of type Integer but could be of any other type.
      Parameters:
      coll - A collection of type T elements.
      pred - A Predicate instance that returns a boolean based on satisfied condition.

    • collect

      public static <T> List<T> collect(Collection<T> coll, Predicate<T> pred)
      Collects all elements into another collection for which predicate is true which is to be returned to the caller.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Template of type Integer but could be of any other type.
      Parameters:
      coll - A collection of type T elements.
      pred - A Predicate instance that returns a boolean based on satisfied condition.
      Returns:
      A list of type T elements that contains all the elements for which the predicate returned true value.

    • find

      public static <T> int find(ArrayList<T> list, Predicate<T> pred)
      Finds and returns first index for which the predicate returns truthy value else returns -1.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Template of type Integer but could be of any other type.
      Parameters:
      list - A collection of type T elements.
      pred - A Predicate instance that returns a boolean based on satisfied condition.
      Returns:
      Index of the first element of which the predicate returns a truthy value or -1 if predicate gives false value for all elements in the collection.
